Title: Measurement of J/ψ polarization in pp collisions at √s = 7 TeV
Abstract: © 2013, CERN for the benefit of the LHCb collaboration.An angular analysis of the decay J/ψ → μ<sup>+</sup> μ<sup>−</sup> is performed to measure the polarization of prompt J/ψ mesons produced in pp collisions at √s = 7 TeV. The dataset corresponds to an integrated luminosity of 0.37 fb<sup>−1</sup> collected with the LHCb detector. The measurement is presented as a function of transverse momentum, p<inf>T</inf>, and rapidity, y, of the J/ψ meson, in the kinematic region 2 < p<inf>T</inf> < 15 GeV/c and 2.0 < y < 4.5.
